message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Hi Bob, I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. How about we try $105?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $95?
Hi Bob, I understand you're still looking to save a bit, but I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to make a small concession, how about we try $98?
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $92?
Hi Bob, I understand you're still looking to save a bit, but I'm not willing to go as low as $92. I'm willing to make another small concession, how about we try $97?
